transcript.title: PM 39/1959 - Universities Commission Report - Reply by the Prime Minister
transcript.content:
The Prime Minister to-day replied to criticismÂ by the Premier of Victoria of his action in releasingÂ the report of the Universities Commission on Monash University.Â 

Mr. Menzies said that, acting on his instructions, Â his Private Secretary, Mr. W. Heseltine, spoke toÂ the Secretary of the Victorian Premaier's Department atÂ about 2.15 on Wednesday afternoon. Mr. Heseltine toldÂ Sir John Jungwirth that it was the Prime Minister's intention,Â if the Prem~ ier saw no objection, to release theÂ report to the press on Wednesday afternoon. Sir JohnÂ said he was sure the Premier would have no objection.Â Mr. Heseltine said " In that case we will arrangeÂ for the release of the report", and Sir John said " Yes,Â that will be all right."Â 

The report was released to the press by the PrimeÂ Minister's Press Secretary about 3 o'clock on WednesdayÂ afternoon.

Canberra,
15 October, 1959
